name: MedicationTherapyManagementServicesForEssentialHypertension
title: Medication Therapy Management Services for Essential Hypertension
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for encounters for medication therapy management services for essential hypertension.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Encounter.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent an encounter for a medication therapy management service for essential hypertension.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions)
